mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM account ac, sys_org org,gateway gw,gateway_policy gwp WHERE ac.status=1 AND org.status=1 AND gw.status=1 AND gwp.status=1 AND ac.org_id=org.org_code AND ac.id=gwp.account_id AND gw.index_code=gwp.gateway_id
AND gwp.start_time <= #{startTime}
AND gwp.end_time >= #{endTime}
AND gw.name LIKE '%${gatewayName}%'
AND ac.name LIKE '%${name}%'
AND ac.no LIKE '%${no}%'
AND ac.certificate_num LIKE '%${certificateNum}%'
